casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Paris Jujuan TODD No. 18A14-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Reid Cater, Attorney at Law, for Todd, Paris Jujuan.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by State of NC on the 2nd of September 2016 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
